Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Note that with default aliveExpirationTimeout (CORE_PEER_GOSSIP_ALIVEEXPIRATIONTIMEOUT) of 25s, peers remove reference to a stopped peer after 25s x 20 = 500s. Therefore other peers in the channel will crash after about 500 seconds (8 minutes) after any peer in the channel is stopped. Due to the severity of this issue, release v1.4.3 will be expedited for delivery by end of August.
